body.name: Phone Tripod, 69" Selfie Stick Tripod for iPhone with Remote, Lightweight Travel Tripod & 360° Rotation, Compatible with iPhone Android Gopro for Selfie/Video Recording/Live Streaming/Vlogging
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 9 hrs 20 mins
features: 【Versatile Selfie Stick with Remote】VICTIV New phone tripod : 2 in 1 Cell Phone Tripod & Selfie Stick, it combines the functions of cellphone tripod stand and selfie stick. Convenient telescoping tube construction transforms into a selfie stick with a simple pull, and adjusts to a 69-inch long selfie stick in seconds. Great for selfies, photography, Youtube, video recording, live streaming and family gatherings.

【69 Inches Tall Adjustable Phone Tripod】The phone selfie stick tripod stand with adjustable telescopic poles is tall enough, can be adjusted from 11.8 inches to 69 inches. The tripod stand for iPhone can capture a wider landscape and meet the needs of people who want to have different shoot heights and apply it in different scenes. Suitable for vlog, photography, live streaming, group photos and more.

【360° Rotating Balance Handle】This phone tripod stand with Balance Handle Supports 180° neck rotation and 360° head rotation, freely define the shooting angle by yourself and unlock more photography possibilities. It can achieve 360° panoramic shooting, 180° up and down shooting,and overhead shooting. It can take photos/videos with excellent stability, suitable for outdoor landscape/people shooting, desktop shooting, etc.

【Lightweight and Portable Travel Tripod】Unique selfie stick cell phone tripod is easy to carry. With a folded length of only 11.8 inch and a weight of 0.74 Ibs, it's incredibly lightweight and easy to carry around. You can easily pack it in your backpack and take it with you wherever you go, making it the perfect travel companion.

【Tripod Stand for Phones and Gopros】The universal rotatable phone holder is compatible with all cellphone between 6cm to 9cm. Tripod mount for iPhone is suitable for almost all the smartphones, fits for iPhone 14 13 12 11 pro max, Samsung Galaxy S23 S22 S21 ultra S10 S9, Huawei Mate 60 Pro P50 P40 P30 Pro and more. With a universal 1/4" screw mount is applicable for most action cameras, fits for Gopro hero 12 11 10 9 8, insta360 action camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well as tripod or self stick
reviews.reviewText: This selfie stick/tripod combo appears well made of quality materials. In the tripod mode, it is quite sturdy, even when extended to full height. I used the tripod to record my very first Amazon video product review and it worked great. The tripod was tall enough for the feet to be on the floor and extend high enough to look over the top of a counter. It could also be short enough to sit on a counter and capture a good look at the work surface. Figuring out how to extend the tripod feet was a challenge, as was how to fold it back up. The phone clamp fit my iPhone mini very well. It could be stretched maybe 3/4 of an inch (2 cm) more, so I think it would accommodate most smart phones.As a selfie stick, it seems a little heavy in the hand. That is, no doubt, due to the tripod feature so it is an acceptable compromise for what you get. When extending the telescoping selfie stick, it is pretty stiff and requires some effort. The shutter, remote, control works easily and reliably.All in all, it seems like a good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks good for price.
reviews.reviewText: Looking forward to using this. Disappointed that it’s only 64” but stoked that it has a remote that works.Also, it doesn’t look like any parts are replaceable—like the phone mount. So if/when it breaks, it’s trash. I’ll update after I’ve used it a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ddelighted with the tripod!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered Victiv's Phone Tripod, 69" Selfie Stick Tripod for iPhone with Remote, Lightweight Travel Tripod & 360° Rotation, Compatible with iPhone Android Gopro for Selfie/Video Recording/Live Streaming/Vlogging for my husband. We are both delighted with the tripod! It is very lightweight and easy to use, yet sturdy enough to stay in place. The 360° rotation feature is a great addition, making it very convenient for capturing videos and taking selfies. I would definitely recommend Victiv's Phone Tripod, 69" Selfie Stick Tripod for iPhone with Remote, Lightweight Travel Tripod & 360° Rotation, Compatible with iPhone Android Gopro for Selfie/Video Recording/Live Streaming/Vlogging to anyone looking for a reliable and versatile tripod for their phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Came in very handy
reviews.reviewText: The various ways that things can be held by this tripod are the strengths of this tripod. I needed a solution for holding a shotgun microphone as well as a iphone last night during my children's orchestra concert last night. The plan I had to use an action camera for it's low light visibility didn't work out because we were too far from the stage. I had to revert to using an iphone to record but didn't really have a good way to hold both things on a single tripod.This tripod allowed me to hold the shotgun microphone on the 1/4" adapter on the top of the tripod and hold my phone on the phone holder at the same time with the two connected via cord.The tripod is light and it was stable. It was also pretty easy to set up. Some of the parts seemed a little fragile though since they were made of plastic. I don't plan on using this tripod a lot but I might be a little concerned with the parts as they go through the rigors of attaching things on/off and screwing things in/out.This is recommended for the value it offers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and Compact
reviews.reviewText: This combination tripod/selfie stick is very simple and easy to use. It is very compact and lightweight since it is made from both plastic and metal. To set up the stand you pull up and outward on the legs. Then, lock the legs in place with the screw-on cap. Gently but firmly pull up on the mount to extend the metal telescoping post. The phone can be mounted in either the horizontal or vertical postion and tilted forward or backward. To make it into a selfie stick simply loosen the screw-on cap and close the stand portion back up into the original postion. Then, tighten the screw cap back on. The remote works well but is very small. (I attached a string to it so I won't lose it.) There is a tiny on/off switch on the side of the remote. Once you turn it to the on postion you can connect to your phone by pressing the main button on the remote. After connecting to my phone I went into my settings and renamed the remote to "tripod" to make it easier to find the each time I use it. Overall, this tripod/selfie stick is a very good product that is easy to use. I recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars First time selfie stick owner
reviews.reviewText: My teenage son asked me for a selfie stick, assuming he wants to make videos. He figured out how to use this quicker than I did, and I still have to ask him to help me with the tripod. The tripod, when extended to it's full length, does not seem very sturdy and I don't think we'll be using that much. For it's lower (desktop) length, it's fine. It took me a moment to figure out the remote (I didn't see the on/off switch at first), and once I figured out what device it was on my Bluetooth settings, I was good to go. How easy it is to take pictures (and video).One thing I am pleased about is that I can fit my phone on without having to remove my case (same with my son's phone of course). That would be an absolute dealbreaker for me if I had to take the case off every single time I wanted to use it. I do think that it (especially the tripod) needs to be more sturdy though before I would absolutely recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This works great!! It was very easy to set up and use. It is very portable and light weight. It can be set up in a minute and used immediately. It is a daily use item for me and cant recommend enough.
